content: **crochet pattern** experience the joy of making this blueberry hat for a little human in your life with this easy-to-follow crochet pattern this adorable hat is more than just yarn and stitches it s a creation that will bring joy and smiles to anyone who sees it the pattern includes seven sizes tailored to fit little humans from newborns to bigger kids and yes even adults as a commitment to quality and your satisfaction this pattern is professionally edited ensuring a smooth and error-free experience **sizes** newborn head 14-15 baby head 15 5-16 5 toddler head 17-18 child head 18 5-20 tween head 20-21 5 adult small head 21 5-23 adult large head 23-24 5 **level** easy ⚫⚫ includes instructions and pictures for special techniques and stitches instructions for basic techniques are available on our website **language** english standard us terms **materials required** worsted weight yarn size medium 4 crochet hook 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge scissors darning needle stitch markers measuring tape **skills required** basic stitch and technique instructions are available on our website instructions for special techniques and stitches are included in the pattern single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain back loop only blo single_crochet 2 together decrease / invisible decrease chainless starting single_crochet magic_ring **support** don t hesitate to reach out if you encounter any issues with the pattern i am always available to assist you and answer any questions you may have throughout the process **copyright and usage** © julivia all rights reserved resell of finished product allowed pattern credit to julivia appreciated **important** this is an instant download media file no physical product will be shipped to you we also do not print and mail patterns
